'''Cool Isle''' is a realm layout in the [[Serenitea Pot]] system. It comes with [[Mondstadt Mansion: Windward Manor]] on Pearl Isle.

==Description==
An island cluster surrounded by water.<br />One wonders how many cups of tea can be brewed from this vast ocean.

==NPCs==
*[[Chubby]]
*[[Tubby]]
